LanguageData.VGE_ExtractOxygenDesc: Extract {THINGEXTRACTCOUNT} oxygen canisters from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VGE_ExtractOxygenDisabled: you need at least {RESOURCEMIN}u³ of oxygen in the tank
LanguageData.VSGE_OxygenValveDesc: Switches oxygen flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VGE_DisabledNoFuel: Requires a connection to the astrofuel network and astrofuel in the tank to work.
LanguageData.VGE_ExtractAstrofuelDesc: Extract all astrofuel from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VGE_ExtractAstrofuelDisabled: you need at least {RESOURCEMIN}l of astrofuel in the tank
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelValveDesc: Switches astrofuel flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
